document_data.name: Remove Disease
document_data.spheres2e: [[Healing sphere|Healing]],<ref group="note">This spell was added to the [[Healing sphere]] by the [[Player's Option: Spells & Magic]]. See page 187. [[Necromantic sphere|Necromantic]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Remove disease''''' was a [[conjuration]] spell that, on touch, magically removed any diseases and killed any parasites from which the subject is suffering.

Effects.[[Lycanthropy]]: Sufficiently experienced priests could cure lycanthropy<ref group="note">According to the [[Monster Manual 4th edition]], page 180, lycanthropy was a hereditary condition and not a disease. if this spell was cast within three days of infection.
Effects.[[Green slime]], [[yellow mold]], [[rot: ''Remove/Cure disease'' was effective on these afflictions. In the case of yellow mold, the cure had to be done before ''[[resurrection (spell)|resurrection]]'' of the victim.
Effects.[[Mummy rot]]: Some strains of this disease could be cured by this spell, but some were curses and required ''[[remove curse]]'' instead. In the Realms, mummy rot was only slowed by this spell. To effect a full cure required the victim drink a special tea prepared from the [[herb]] [[mother's leaf]] before casting ''cure disease''.

document_data.Components: Only verbal and somatic components were required to cast this spell. For certain kinds of [[mummy rot]] an herbal tea brewed from the mother's leaf plant had to be consumed first. Mothersleaf could be found in northern temperate and subarctic regions by those with skill in plant lore.
document_data.History: It was recorded in ''[[Yornar's Trail Companion]]'', a holy text of the [[church of Mielikki]].<ref>
